common.title: Ownabee - Where Children's Imagination Becomes Books
common.description: Ownabee is an AI-powered creative storybook platform that transforms children's spoken or written stories into illustrated books with audio narration.
common.interfaceDescription: The intuitive interface is easy for children to use, and with the help of teachers or parents, they can create even richer stories.

hero.title: AI-Powered Storybooks for Children's Creativity
hero.subtitle: Ownabee helps children create their own personalized storybooks with the help of AI, fostering creativity and literacy skills.

journey.title: How It Works
journey.description: Introducing the creative journey children take with Ownabee. Through simple steps, your child's imagination becomes a real book.
journey.step1Description: The child selects the title and genre of the story they want to create.
journey.step2Description: The child speaks or writes their story directly.
journey.step3Description: Select and customize various drawing styles and characters.
journey.step4Description: Choose the audiobook voice and design the book cover.

audiobook.title: AI Voice Synthesis
audiobook.description: Experience our advanced voice synthesis technology that brings stories to life.

player.title: Audiobook Player
player.storyTitle: Bedtime Stories Read in Your Child's Voice
player.experienceText: Experience natural voice synthesis technology implemented with BeeGM AI.

features.title: Real Voice Learning
features.description: You can train it to learn any voice you want, such as your child's or parents'.

features.title: Various Voice Styles
features.description: Create audiobooks with a variety of trained voices.

meaning.title: Why Ownabee?
meaning.description: Ownabee comes from 'own' + 'story' + 'bee' - like busy bees, children create their own unique stories.
meaning.mainDescription: The name Ownabee represents our core mission of empowering children to create and own their stories.
meaning.description1: Children take ownership of their creative process and stories.
meaning.description2: Every child has unique stories waiting to be told and shared.
meaning.description3: Like busy bees, children work creatively to build something beautiful.

growth.title: Growth Through Creative Activities
growth.description: Ownabee is not just a book creation platform. It's an educational tool that helps children develop creativity and confidence as they create their own stories.

kindergarten.title: Why Kindergartens Need Ownabee
kindergarten.subtitle: Enhancing educational experiences through creative storytelling
kindergarten.description1: Engage children with interactive storytelling that makes learning fun and memorable
kindergarten.description2: Help children express and understand emotions through creative storytelling
kindergarten.description3: Provide tools for children to explore their imagination in a structured environment

usage.title: Ownabee in Kindergartens
usage.subtitle: Educational activities that foster children's creativity

educationalEffects.title: Educational Effects
effects: Develops digital literacy in a safe environment

useCases.title: How Families Use Ownabee
useCases.subtitle: Create meaningful moments with your child
useCases.feedbackQuote: Through Ownabee, children have greatly improved their confidence and creativity by creating and sharing their own stories. Parents' reactions have also been very positive.

tech.title: Our Technology
tech.subtitle: Ownabee combines cutting-edge AI technologies to create personalized storybooks for children.

component1.title: Story Generation
component1.description: AI-powered story creation based on your child's interests

component2.title: Illustration
component2.description: Beautiful, custom illustrations that match the story

component3.title: Voice Synthesis
component3.description: Realistic voice narration that brings stories to life

voice.title: Advanced Voice Synthesis
voice.description: Our voice synthesis technology creates natural-sounding narration that captures the emotion and nuance of each story. Children can hear their stories read in familiar voices.
features: Voice cloning from just a few minutes of audio
Emotional expression that matches the story content
Support for multiple languages and accents
Custom voice profiles for each family member

case1.title: Bedtime Stories
case1.description: Transform nighttime routines with personalized stories created by your child.
case1.feedback: Bedtime stories created with Ownabee have significantly improved our students' sleep routines. Parents report children are more excited for bedtime and have better sleep quality.

case2.title: Family Adventures
case2.description: Turn family trips and experiences into lasting memories through illustrated stories.
case2.feedback: The family adventure stories have been wonderful for building communication skills. Children love sharing their weekend experiences through creative storytelling with Ownabee.

case3.title: Learning Moments
case3.description: Make educational concepts stick by letting children create stories about what they've learned.
case3.feedback: Through Ownabee, children have greatly improved their confidence and creativity by creating stories about what they've learned. It reinforces educational concepts in a fun, engaging way.

tech.title: BeeGM AI
tech.description: Our AI technology creates high-quality illustrations and narration for children's stories.

voice.title: High-Quality AI Voice Synthesis
voice.description: Using 'BeeGM AI' technology to create natural, emotion-rich voices. We leverage the same technology used in 'SynchroU' broadcasts to deliver premium voice quality.

tech.subtitle: How our technology works

component1.title: Natural Language Processing
component1.description: Understands children's stories and extracts key elements for visualization.

component2.title: Image Generation
component2.description: Creates vibrant, child-friendly illustrations that match the story content.

component3.title: Voice Synthesis
component3.description: Transforms text into natural-sounding narration with appropriate pacing and emotion.

uiExamples.title: User Experience
uiExamples.subtitle: Designed for children and adults alike
uiExamples.description: Explore the intuitive interface of Ownabee

example1.title: Story Creation
example1.description: Create stories with simple prompts and watch them come to life.

example2.title: Character Design
example2.description: Describe characters and see them visualized instantly.

example3.title: Audio Narration
example3.description: Listen to the story with professional-quality narration.

example4.title: Sharing Options
example4.description: Easily share completed books with family members and teachers.

item1.title: Kindergarten Dashboard
item1.description: A dedicated dashboard for kindergartens to track student progress and activities.

item2.title: Creation Archive
item2.description: An archive system to store and showcase children's creative works over time.

item3.title: Parent Sharing
item3.description: Enhanced sharing features for parents to view and share their children's creations.

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: We're constantly improving our AI to create even more magical experiences.

collaboration.title: Let's Work Together
collaboration.subtitle: Join the children's storytelling revolution
collaboration.description: Have questions or want to collaborate? Get in touch!

form.title: Inquiry Form
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project or inquiry
form.privacyLabel: I agree to the privacy policy

growTogether.title: Grow Together
growTogether.description1: Join us in our mission to inspire the next generation of storytellers.
growTogether.description2: We're always looking for partners who share our vision for creative education.
